titles: De juramento seven lectures concerning the obligation of promissory oathes / read publicly in the divinity school of Oxford by Robert Sanderson ; translated into English by His Late Majesties speciall command and afterwards revised and approved under His Majesties own hand.
author: Sanderson, Robert, 1587-1663.
publisher: Printed by E.C. for Humphrey Moseley, Octavian Pulleyn and Andrew Crook ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
